snippet: Most hockey fights are settled on the ice. Sunday's explosion of tempers between the Flyers and Penguins carried all the way into the benches, as even the coaches were arguing.
abstract: Most hockey fights are settled on the ice. Sunday's explosion of tempers between the Flyers and Penguins carried all the way into the benches, as even the coaches were arguing.

headline.main: In a Fight Between the Flyers and Penguins, Even the Coaches Get Involved
